xiāng
(literary) to run friskily (of a horse); to raise; to hold high
(литературно) резво (на лошади); поднять; держать высоко

(Simplified: 骧)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 襄 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
    • 襄 [ xiāng ] to aid, to help, to assist; to undress
①後右蹄白色的馬。
②馬奔跑：驤騰。
③頭高昂：驤首。

驤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāng］
［《廣韻》息良切，平陽，心。］
“骧1”的繁体字。
(1)后右足白的马。
(2)上仰；上举。
(3)奔驰，腾越。

驤字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　驤； 康熙笔画：27； 页码：页1447第03
【唐韻】【正韻】息良切【集韻】【韻會】思將切，?音襄。【爾雅·釋畜】後右足白驤。　又【說文】馬之低昂也。【六書故】馬行迅疾，首騰驤也。　又舉也，遠也。【蜀志·諸葛亮傳】亮之素志，欲龍驤虎視，苞括四海。【潘岳·籍田賦】龍驥驤騰。　又官名。【晉書·五行志】孫皓天紀中童謠曰：不畏岸上獸，但畏水中龍。武帝聞之，加王濬龍驤將軍。　又古通襄韻。【前漢·韓彭英盧敘傳】雲起龍襄，化爲侯王。　又【集韻】如陽切，音穰。馬右足白。【字彙補】作馬名，非。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Horse Character Department】　骧; Kangxi Strokes: 27; Page Number: Page 1447 Page 03
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Xi Liang Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Thinking will cut,? Yin Xiang. 【Erya·Shu Hu】White Xiang on the back of the right foot.　[Said the text] The horse is low and high. [Six Books] The horse is fast, and the first rises.　Also, far away. [Shu Zhi · Zhuge Liang Biography] The light of the original aspirations, longing for the dragon to look at it, enveloping the whole world. 【Pan Yue·Ji Tian Fu】Long Ji Xiangteng.　Also official name. [Book of Jin·Five Elements] Sun Haotian's nursery rhyme in Jizhong said: Do not fear the beast on the shore, but fear the dragon in the water. When Emperor Wu heard it, he added General Wang Jun Longxiang.　Ancient Tongxiang rhyme. [Previous Han·Han Pengying Lu Xu Biography] Cloud rises from Longxiang and turns into King Hou.　[Jiyun] like Yang cut, sound Rang. The right foot of the horse is white. 【Word Supplement】For the name of the horse, it is not.
